response.original_title: Stop Crying, I Married Someone Better
response.overview: Scarlett Winters is devastated when her fiancé, Carlton Simmons, abandons her at the altar. Fleeing in humiliation, she’s nearly hit by a car, an incident orchestrated by Leo Forester, genius and legendary CEO who recognizes the runaway bride. Leo offers her an unusual solution: a contract marriage to help her regain her dignity and rebuild her life. As Scarlett heals, Leo secretly supports her, hiding his true identity and intentions. But when old enemies resurface and buried secrets emerge, Scarlett feels betrayed and considers leaving. Now Leo must decide: confess his feelings or risk losing her forever.
response.title: Stop Crying, I Married Someone Better
